definition[0]: one of the two soft parts around your mouth where your skin is redder or darker
note[0]: thin-lipped/thick-lipped/full-lipped (=having lips that are thin, or large and round)
example[0]: She had big eyes and full lips (=large and round lips).
example[1]: Matt opened the door with a smile on his lips.
example[2]: Marty kissed me right on the lips!
example[3]: Stephen pursed his lips with distaste  (=brought them together tightly into a small circle).
definition[1]: the edge of a hollow or deep place in the land
example[5]: the old road that ran along the lip of the gorge
definition[2]: the edge of something you use to hold or pour liquid
definition[3]: talk that is not polite or respectful – used especially by adults to children
example[6]: Don’t give me any of your lip!
